alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 10 at 3:38AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR MILO ORTIZ, A WHITE MALE who is 4 YEARS OLD. He is 3 FEET 6 INCHES TALL, and weighs 41 POUNDS. He has BROWN HAIR and BROWN EYES and was LAST SEEN WEARING A BLUE LONG SLEEVE SHIRT, GRAY SWEATPANTS, AND TENNIS SHOES. THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT IS ALSO SEARCHING FOR SIENNA ORTIZ, A WHITE FEMALE who is 2 YEARS OLD. She is 2 FEET 6 INCHES tall and weighs 29 POUNDS. She has BROWN HAIR and BROWN EYES and was LAST SEEN WEARING AN AQUA BLUE BLOUSE WITH PINK FIGURINES AND WHITE CONVERSE SHOES POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR DEMETRI ORTIZ, A 22 YEARS OLD WHITE MALE. He is 5 FEET, 7 INCHES TALL and weighs 130 POUNDS. He has BLACK HAIR and BROWN EYES AND was LAST SEEN WEARING A WHITE SHIRT AND BLACK SHORTS, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. The SUSPECT HAS A TATTOO ON HIS CHEST. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLACK, 2015, CHRYSLER 300 BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER L P R 4 5 4 3. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 0 2 0 7 7 6 6 0.
